long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Canvas Reminder helps keep track of all your Canvas assignments without having to log in. Copy and paste the assignment page address, give it a title, and set a due date and you'll be reminded of your assignment no matter the page you're on.
